arts.ttl: Watch the goals as Dundee Utd strike late to win derby
arts.sum: Watch the best of the action as Dundee United score late on to come from behind to win the derby.

arts.ttl: Jim Goodwin takes Aberdeen implosion as cautionary Dundee Utd tale as triumphant boss roars 'I wish season was over NOW'
arts.sum: Sam Dalby's Dens Park winner sparked wild scenes in the away end and pushed United above Aberdeen in the table

arts.ttl: Kevin Holt finds redemption as Dundee United nick late win at city rivals
arts.sum: Holtâ€™s handball allowed his former club Dundee to take the lead from the penalty spot.

arts.ttl: Dalby nets late winner for Dundee United to sink rivals Dundee
arts.sum: Sam Dalby scored an 88th-minute winner as Dundee United produced a second-half turnaround to win 2-1 at rivals Dundee.

arts.ttl: Finlay Robertson hoping for Dundee derby celebration in front of his United-supporting pals
arts.sum: The midfielder is hoping to get one over on his mates in the derby at Dens Park

arts.ttl: Kevin Holt expects Dundee derby 'abuse' as United defender makes Dens Park return
arts.sum: Holt previously played for city rivals Dundee between 2015 and 2018

arts.ttl: Dundee United star Emmanuel Adegboyega is more than prepared for derby noise - 'I need to be part of this'
arts.sum: The on-loan defender will get his chance when Dundee United take the short walk up the road tomorrow afternoon.

arts.ttl: Dundee boss Tony Docherty on why he would he have no qualms about throwing Luke Graham into the derby
arts.sum: The defender, who played in the 2-2 Premiership derby opener at Tannadice, has just been recalled from a successful spell with Championship table-toppers Falkirk.
